description: 1 x Birch (applicants ref. T1) - Approximately 7.00m: Reduce by approximately 1.25m. Thin crown density by 15%-20%. Raise crown by up to 1.00m. General maintenance.  1 x Pittosporum (applicants ref. S1) - Approximately 4.00m: Trim by approximately 0.5m. To tidy and control encroachment.1 x Lilac (applicants ref. S2) - Approximately 3.50m. Reduce to an approximately height of 2.00m. General maintenance.1 x Large Pittosporum (applicants ref. T2) - Approximately 5.00m: Reduce by approximately 0.50m all round. General maintenance.1 x Japanese Maple (applicants ref. T3) - Approximately 4.00m: Reduce crown by approximately 1.00m to help produce and promote a compact crown structure. General maintenance.1 x Chinese Privet (applicants ref. T4) - Approximately 5.50m: Reduce crown by approximately 1.20m. To tidy and control encroachment over garden.1 x Mature Hawthorn (applicants ref. T5) - Approximately 6.00m: (Ivy Clad and growing into Chinese privet, Growing in neighbouring property): Reduce ivy back to as near to the boundary as is practicable to separate from Chinese privet and increase light levels. Control encroachment/increase light levels. (exempt works)
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
